Verify data/exports/waypoint-ui.json created with export or externalUrl
Verify data/exports/baganator.json created with export or externalUrl
Verify data/exports/blizzhudtweaks.json created with export or externalUrl
Verify data/exports/cooldown-manager.json created with export or externalUrl
Verify each addon JSON includes: id, name, description, lastUpdated
Verify placeholder images added to each addon (using picsum.photos or similar)
Verify setup instructions provided for each addon

description: Display last updated timestamp on collapsed (unexpanded) card view
steps: Verify formatRelativeTime utility imported into ExportCard component
Verify timestamp displayed in collapsed card view alongside addon name
Verify timestamp positioned below addon name with appropriate spacing
Verify timestamp uses white/80 opacity for subtle appearance
Verify timestamp has text shadow or drop shadow for readability over images
Verify timestamp styling consistent with design system (glass effects)
Verify timestamp maintains WCAG contrast ratios against gradient overlay
Verify timestamp responsive on mobile/tablet/desktop
Verify timestamp does not interfere with buttons or card interactivity

description: Add smooth height transition animation for card expansion/collapse
steps: Verify card height transitions smoothly when expanding (e.g., from min-h-[300px] to min-h-[600px])
Verify card height transitions smoothly when collapsing back to original size
Verify transition duration appropriate for smooth animation (500ms or similar)
Verify transition easing function provides natural motion (ease-in-out or custom cubic-bezier)
Verify transition-all or specific height/max-height transition applied to Card component
Verify expanded card content fades in smoothly (opacity transition) after height animation starts
Verify collapsed content fades out before height animation (prevents content jump)
Verify animation respects prefers-reduced-motion accessibility setting
Verify animation performs smoothly without lag on various devices
Verify bento grid layout reflows gracefully during animation
Verify no content overflow or clipping during transition
Verify animation works correctly when rapidly expanding/collapsing multiple cards

description: Remove thumbnail navigation UI from expanded card, rely only on carousel indicator dots
steps: Verify thumbnail image navigation section removed from expanded card view (lines ~252-277 in export-card.tsx)
Verify prev/next arrow buttons removed from expanded view carousel navigation (ChevronLeft/ChevronRight buttons)
Verify 'Image X of Y' text counter removed from expanded view
Verify glass-strong panel wrapper for carousel controls removed from expanded view
Verify carousel indicator dots remain visible in expanded card view (not just collapsed)
Verify indicator dots repositioned for expanded view (e.g., bottom-center with proper z-index)
Verify indicator dots remain clickable in both collapsed and expanded states
Verify indicator dots have sufficient visibility against expanded card background
Verify keyboard navigation still works (ArrowLeft/ArrowRight to navigate images)
Verify ARIA labels maintained for accessibility ('Image X of Y' announced for screen readers)
Verify expanded card layout uses reclaimed space more efficiently
Verify setup instructions and description have more breathing room
Verify responsive behavior maintained on mobile/tablet/desktop
